original_text: And these are the children of Zibeon; both Ajah, and Anah: this was that Anah that found the mules in the wilderness, as he fed the asses of Zibeon his father.
korean_text: 시브온의 자녀는 아야와 아나며 이 아나는 그 아버지 시브온의 나귀를 칠 때에 광야에서 온천을 발견하였고

sentences.original_text: And these are the children of Zibeon
that found the mules in the wilderness
as he fed the asses of Zibeon his father
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 자기 아버지 시본의 나귀들을 먹일 때
